languages.text: Falco deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy suffering a {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect in combat (but no more than +100% damage).
languages.original_text: Фалько наносит на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} за каждого противника, на которого действует эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} (прибавка к урону не может превышать 100%).

traits.locale_text: Falco deals +10% damage for each enemy with toxin, bleeding, or burning effect in combat (but no more than +100% damage).
Falco deals +10% damage for each enemy suffering a toxin, bleeding, or burning effect in combat (but no more than +100% damage).

Falco deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for each enemy suffering a {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect in combat (but no more than +100% damage).
